SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[CMSSlide] ( [CMSSlide_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [CMSSlide_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSSlide_Data] datetime NULL , [Utenti_Ky] int NULL , [CMSSlide_UserInsert] int NULL , [CMSSlide_UserUpdate] int NULL , [CMSSlide_UserDelete] int NULL , [CMSSlide_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [CMSSlide_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [CMSSlide_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [CMSSlide_Url] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSSlide_Codice] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSSlide_Foto] varchar(200) NULL , [CMSCategorie_Ky] int NULL , [CMSSlide_Tags] varchar(MAX) NULL , [Lingue_Ky] tinyint NULL , [CMSSlide_PubblicaWEB] bit NULL , [CMSSlide_Ordine] int NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[CMSSlide] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_CMSSlide PRIMARY KEY ([CMSSlide_Ky])
